scripts.create:lambda: npm run build && claudia create --name $npm_package_config_name --region $npm_package_config_region --deploy-proxy-api --handler bin/server.handler
scripts.create:s3: aws s3 mb s3://$npm_package_config_assetBucket && aws s3 website s3://$npm_package_config_assetBucket --index-document $npm_package_config_assetBucketIndex
scripts.create: npm run create:lambda && npm run create:s3
scripts.deploy:s3: npm run build && aws s3 cp ./dist/ s3://$npm_package_config_assetBucket/assets/ --recursive --region ap-southeast-2 --grants read=uri=http://acs.amazonaws.com/groups/global/AllUsers
scripts.deploy: npm run deploy:s3 && npm run deploy:lambda
scripts.destroy: npm run destroy:s3 && npm run destroy:lambda
